description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, defining a simple app with a homepage that displays a message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the UI showing a loading message and progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
